description:
It`s time for the big school event: nature camp! Pascal`s behaving like a proper teacher for once, but will it last? Meanwhile, the heir to a kingdom finds the light of bravery in the darkness, and Mr. DiCaprio learns how not to be rude in English.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Enjoy! Nature Camp Part One / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
Enjoy! Rinkangakkou Zenpen / Perfect Plate / America Oudan Pascalinglish
エンジョイ! 林間学校 前編 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / アメリカ横断パスカリングリッシュ
